item.description:
This class uses ballet and pilate isolations to build lean strong muscles through out the body. We use a chair, a body ball, and resistance bands to help balance and use our own body weight to build muscles you may have forgot about. You will leave this class knowing and feeling like you got an unbelievable workout. It improves posture , builds lean muscle, and burns calories all at once. If you always wanted a ballerina body give it try!

Bring water (available at the studio for $1) and wear comfortable clothes (you are working out-it will get hot) and sneakers

$10/class or 10 class pack for $90 (can also be used for Bootcamp, Hip Hop, and Zumba)

Please..you must pre-register for our classes 2 hours prior to class time. It is simple.
Step 1. Go to our web site www.bridgetsdancestudio.com
Step 2. Click on the Register for Adult Class Page
Step 3. Scroll down to the bottom of the page and fill in the easy form
Step 4. Click Send (no payment is taken at this time)
